item.title: How to Use Github
item.description: What is GitHub? One word: a code hosting platform allowing version control and collaboration. GitHub vs Git Git is local. Github is remote. Basics git init creates a new Git repository. git add adds a local change to the staging area, which is not synced until git commit git commit captures a snapshot of the staged changes â€“ just like take a photo of the staged repository. git push uploads the commited respository to the remote repository.
